r.s: Sundown is a fast, robust Markdown parsing library for PHP5
r.d:
Sundown is a fast, robust Markdown parsing library, originally created by Natacha PortÃ© and improved Vicent Marti. this extension inspired Redcarpet ruby extension which created by Vicent.
PECL Sundown provides straight forward object oriented Markdown API and customizable Renders.
r.n:
bumped up 0.3.1
[summary] * fixed overloading callback methods. * fixed segfault when calling render method more than once. * implement more test cases.
